title: Runpod Worker Ollama
description: A serverless Ollama Worker for Runpod

input.name: Model Name
input.description: Name of a model to preload

input.name: Flash Attention
input.description: Enable flash attention for faster inference (set to 1)

input.name: Max Concurrency
input.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to handle (default: 8)

input.name: Parallel Requests
input.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to handle (default: 4 or 1)

input.name: Ollama Models Directory
input.description: Directory to store Ollama models (default: /runpod-volume for persistence)

input.name: OpenAI API Key
input.description: OpenAI API key for GPT models (required for Pear Care pipeline)
